text: Claudia Vanessa Dobles Camargo (born 19 November 1980) is a Costa Rican architect and urban planner. Dobles is the wife of President Carlos Alvarado Quesada. She was the First Lady of Costa Rica from 2018 until 2022. She is the first person from San Carlos to hold the position of first lady. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Costa Rica Category:Architects
title: Claudia Dobles Camargo
